title: Morde 1.8K Damage in 1 Q auto?
body:
Got 1 shot as Ekko by Morde with Steraks, Trinity, Dead man's plate, A Needless item (I think) and tank items.

He Q'd someone else, hit E for Trinity Force bonus and then auto'd me and I died instantly.

replies.body: go ad crit mord you do 1k ad crits and 1k ap q so yer cant build to stop his q

They could make morde a more rounded champ.... But no they just exaggerated his already high damage.

So for now youre going to want to wear a chastity belt so Morde doesn't get inside you.
How does he deal so much damage with only 2 q's and base damage scaling?

He had Rylai's, Trinity and Sterak's with Tank items Level 18 - 146 base AD plus 36 plus another 36 base from the steraks which activated so 220 damage autos plus the huge sheen boost with it scaling on base dmg so like 440 auto with like a 3rd Q and a crit or something lol idk.

If his Q is 130 for first part is 390 for 2nd and like 1200 for 3rd so you're basically dead instantly with base damage and trinity proc on top of that if he hits you with 2nd and 3rd.

thats new morde for you

its bs
Lol I was like wtf just happened to me.
Yeah im assuming you know how Morde's Q works right?

Yeah lol. Musta been his 3rd hit coz I jumped into the fight late and basically E'd to him then started running past him coz I knew I'd die if his 3rd Q was up and just died instantly, even before I could R.
